website_summaries.verdict: A track shoe that comes with all the bells and whistles to propel you to the finish line.
pros: According to customers, ordering a half of size up will fit like second skin on the fleet-footed feet of those wearing these shoes
Lightweight and comes with spikes and tools to adjust the tension
cons: Only designed for a synthetic track

customer_reviews.title: I am glad we tried on first
customer_reviews.text: These were for my son. We had tried on similar saucony track spikes at a store, they just didnt have the shoes he needed for his distance at the store so we ordered from Amazon. I am glad we tried on first, they are supposed to fit like a glove, but seem a bit narrower than most shoes. Thankfully they worked out for my son and fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T

customer_reviews.title: First time track runner
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He wears a size 11 but ordered 11.5 because he has wide feet. The shoes fit great and still had a glove like feel. Light weight and made well.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ

customer_reviews.title: Really fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great. My son ran his first ever track meet last night with these (his first ever track shoes) and he won all 3 races he was in. He loves them and it's actually hard to get him to take the shoes off bc he is so comfortable wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: For speed and short runs only.
customer_reviews.text: These are made for very short runs, like 100 meters at most. They are very durable, essentially hard plastic and unforgiving. We ended up going with Saucony cross country spikes instead which are fantastic and put these on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about them running small is correct. I bought 1.5 sizes bigger and they fit perfect with enough room.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Trini

customer_reviews.title: Great value but go up 1/2 to 1 full size
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Definitely recommend getting 1/2 to 1 size bigger than your usual size (specially if you have a wide foot).
customer_reviews.author: Mayco

customer_reviews.title: Get a 1⁄2 size up and make your high school track star happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is very adequate for high school track team. Son is very happy. I am glad that I chose half-size up as the fit is somewhat smaller.
customer_reviews.author: AstuteBuyer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. However he wears size 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. However he wears size 3 regularly so i purchased a 4 but it seems tight. I would go 2 sizes up. So I will have to get a 4.5 or 5 for him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order the next size up
customer_reviews.text: ouch...Runs a half size too small. Uncomfortable fit!! No other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Countryman

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, attractive, but not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well-constructed. Too soon to tell how durable. Runs *very* narrow - not the right choice for those with wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fro track, remove once on a smooth surface. They become very slippery on floors
customer_reviews.author: Louis in CT

customer_reviews.title: Unusual purpose
customer_reviews.text: These have a firm sole and I use them for riding my fixie (sans spikes) instead of running track - great price
customer_reviews.author: Marg Inoferror

customer_reviews.title: Very fast delivery and my son reall likes the shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery and my son reall likes the shoes. They just fit small so order a size up from your regular size
customer_reviews.author: Marion Edwards

customer_reviews.title: 16 year old loves his new shoes
customer_reviews.text: Our 16 year old requested these for improving his speed during sprinting meets for track at his school. He feels comfortable and is able to use them with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the shoe. He usually wears a 5.5 but I bought a 7 and it fits well with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Enelrehs

customer_reviews.title: He ran faster in these shoes. We did not expect it..but we are new to this
customer_reviews.text: All i can say is that my son won in the 100 meters and 200 meters wearing these shoes....and it was not expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but fits way to small
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but fits way to small. I bought a size 12 as well and it fits way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Dhonie Style

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 yr old and he loves them. He says that they fit perfectly and he prefers to wear no socks with them. The bottom has a great number of spikes and it does not bend. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal White

customer_reviews.title: Track Shoe!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is somewhat small but a great style for sprinters
customer_reviews.author: Denoah

customer_reviews.title: The left shoe was good but felt the difference immediately when tried to put ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes felt twisted. The left shoe was good but felt the difference immediately when tried to put the right one on. Apparently it was not made well.
customer_reviews.author: mustang

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: A little surprised that these were so low priced! Great spikes for our teenage budding track star 🌟
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and our son loves them! Ready for track season to begin.
customer_reviews.author: Janice R.

customer_reviews.title: ... spike is everything that I expected and entry level super stiff sprint spike
customer_reviews.text: The spike is everything that I expected and entry level super stiff sprint spike. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jakobe Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe seems solid but will have to return for larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Robert PETERSON

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the shoe but the fit was way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size. But I had to return the shoes because they are too narrow. After I returned them, I ordered another pair of similar shoes by Saucony, .5 size up, which fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes...
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this show. He said it feel sturdier and professional looking than other shoes he has had. Unfortunately it was missing a spike (we checked the box but it was not there).
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my son. He likes the shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. He likes the shoes, but says it's a little more snug than he's used to. Sprinter's shoes are supposed to have a glove-like fit so he'll have to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Spitfire 4 Track Shoe
product_meta.description: The spitfire 4 has the speed, the control and the comfort for the track. Question is, do you have what it takes to handle the best valued sprint spike on the market?
feature_bullets: 7 pin pebax spike plate, molded quarter cage,
